text:
{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"2","subject":"Analyze team config and member management","description":"Research how Claude Code manages team configuration and members. Examine:
1. The ~/.claude/teams/<team>/ directory structure
2. config.json format - team name, members array, lead agent
3. Member fields: agentId, name, agentType, model, prompt, color, planModeRequired, joinedAt, tmuxPaneId, cwd, backendType
4. How members are added (TeamCreate creates lead, Task tool spawns teammates)
5. The coordinator/team-lead vs general-purpose agent types
6. How member discovery works (reading config.json)

Look at the live demo-smoke-test team data in ~/.claude/teams/demo-smoke-test/ and the Hive source in src/agent_teams/task_sync.rs.

Write your findings to /Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/agent-teams-analysis/02-team-config.md

Also copy ~/.claude/teams/demo-smoke-test/config.json to /Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/agent-teams-analysis/raw/team/","assignedBy":"team-lead","timestamp":"2026-02-09T15:08:17.410Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"6","subject":"config-analyst","description":"You are part of the analysis-team. Your task is to analyze how Claude Code manages team configuratio","assignedBy":"config-analyst","timestamp":"2026-02-09T15:08:32.292Z"}

You got interrupted before writing the analysis markdown. The raw files are already copied to /Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/agent-teams-analysis/raw/team/. Now please write the analysis document to /Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/agent-teams-analysis/02-team-config.md based on what you found. Then mark task #2 as completed.
